published: April 24, 2016 url: blogging tags: - Blog - Gulp layout: posts ---

This blog was made using Panini, a super simple flat file generator, Markdown, Handlebars and Gulp. The design is done with Foundation for sites.

Basically I just wanted to do some advanced stuff with flat file generation and also wanted to have a place to write occasionally about things I am doing. n general this blog will be mostly about stuff I develop and general thoughts I have.

A blog by Marius Olbertz.
Built using Gulp, Foundation, Panini.
